R

readCards(String) - Method in class custom_database.Database
readCards method reads in the theme, calls setImagePath method, and passes the cards array and theme.
readSave() - Method in class custom_database.Database
readSave method reads the high scores from "high_score.txt" in the data folder.
resetCards() - Method in class greymageddon.FrmMain
resetCards method enables all 36 buttons and sets the icons to empty.
restart() - Method in class greymageddon.FrmMain
restart method restarts every part of the game.
